description.value: At 8th level, the samurai can cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.tsndfcfijmgxs37p]{Darkness} on a weapon he is holding. The @Compendium[pf1.spells.tsndfcfijmgxs37p]{Darkness} does not affect the vision of any order of the eclipse samurai, or that of their mounts. The spell immediately ends if the weapon leaves the samuraiâ€™s hand. He may do this once per day, plus one additional time per day for every four levels he possesses above 8th (to a maximum of four times per day at 20th level).
